Student
public final class PGRStudent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Student
Version:
1.0 30/10/2020 PGRStudent - implementation for PGR students that have a supervisor and take no modules
Author:
Joe Sheen

  • Constructor Details

    • PGRStudent

      public PGRStudent​(Name studentName, java.util.Date dateOfBirth, StudentType studentType)
      Constructs a PGRStudent object when provided with the parameters specified
      Parameters:
      studentName - is the name of the PGRStudent
      dateOfBirth - is the date of birth for the PGRStudent
      studentType - is the type of the student (e.g. PGR).
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if dateOfBirth is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if studentType is not valid
